author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: Fertility Apps Are Multiplying. But Are They Reliable?
text:
More women are counting on their smartphones to help them avoid getting pregnant—a trend that has some experts worried.
As people increasingly turn to technology to monitor everything from their sleep to heart palpitations, apps that help women track their fertility are taking off, particularly among millennials, even as questions swirl about their reliability as a sole form of birth control.
